data.actual_result: The suggestion/auto-complete bar appears for a split second before disappearing  and you can't convert your input to katakana or kanji
data.expected_result: - The server search should work properly with the Japanese keyboard and allow you to convert it to katakana or kanjis. The suggestion/auto-complete should also appear
data.short_description: Japanese input is broken with the server search
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Enable the Japanese keyboard by going to General > Keyboard > Add new keyboard Open discord and swipe right to open the server list - Tap on the search in a server.- Tap/hold on the globe icon and change your keyboard to the Japanese one - Type in a character or two - Observe
